Sentencas: Anode microstructure has a great influence on the cell performance.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: The addition of urea into impregnated solution has been proposed to tailor the distribution and/or morphology of Cu when fabricating the Cu-based anodes by impregnation method.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: While the previous reports demonstrated the single cell performance has not been improved in this route, in this paper, fuel cells with Cu/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and Cu-CeO2/YSZ anodes were fabricated and evaluated with improved outputs.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: The microstructure of Cu in anodes appeared significantly different after the addition of urea.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: The electronic conductivity obtained from the anodes impregnated with adding urea was twice as high as the ones without.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: Performance of fuel cells increases by 12% while operating on H-2 at 700 degrees C upon adding urea.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: Furthermore, the performance improvement was more prominent when such method was adopted in the fabrication of Cu-CeO2/YSZ composite anodes.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: Cells with Cu-CeO2/YSZ composite anodes operating in H-2 at 700 degrees C exhibited an increase of cell performance by 37%, from 337 to 462 mW cm(-2), by simply adding urea to the impregnated solution.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method

Sentencas: And the performance enhancement for such fuel cells is also as high as 28% when using CH4 as fuel.
Titulo: Effect of adding urea on performance of Cu/CeO2/yttria-stabilized zirconia anodes for solid oxide fuel cells prepared by impregnation method
